text:
RELIGION

Ramakrishna Math: Discourse on “Aanmeega Vaazkai,’ by Swami Rajeshanandar, 5.45 p.m., Aarathi, Reserve Line, New Natham Road, 6.30 p.m.

Gita Bhavanam: 68{+t}{+h}anniversary, 45-day yagna, Kamarajar Salai, 7.30 a.m.

Paneeru Thirumurai Mandram: Pannisai by S.S. Mohanram, Adi Streets, 7 a.m., Discourse on ‘Periyapuranam’ by N.S. Sundararaman, No. 26 Pandian Street, Sundar Nagar, Tirunagar, 5 p.m.

Young Men’s Brahmins’ Association: Sri Vishnu Sahasranama parayanam and puja, No. 21 Sambandamoorthy Street, 6 p.m.

Sreemath Bhagavath Gita Siravana Samajam: 85{+t}{+h}year Sreemath Gita Siravana, Gita upanyasam, Govinda Dasa Seva Samajam, Mahal 6{+t}{+h}Street, 6 p.m.

Tirupavai Tiruvembavai Isaipalli: Devotional songs 6 a.m., Paavai songs and devotional songs, Adi Street 6 p.m.

Madurai Srimad Venkatramana Bhagavatha Seva Samajam: 235{+t}{+h}jayanthi celebrations of Venkatramana Bhagavathar, third-day events, Malligai Balachandar presides, 10.30 a.m., flute by Dr. G. Baskar Rajan Sourashtra Sabai, Sri Renga Mahal, No. 13 South Krishnan Koil Street South Masi, 8 p.m.

The American College: Sunday Vespers Service J. John Rajkumar preaches, W. Prince Earnest leads, Jubilee chapel, 6 p.m.

Church of Christ: Sunday service, Bro. Devamanickam speaks, Thanksgiving by M.S. Raja, Gnanaolivupuram, 10 a.m. and 6 p.m.

CULTURE

Sri Sathguru Sangeetha Samajam: 64{+t}{+h}music and arts festival, vocal concert by Sanjay Subrahmanyan, Lakshmi Sundaram Hall, 6 p.m.

Hindu Temple Protection Committee: Uzhavara Pani, Koodal Alagar Temple, Sri Akilandeswari Samedha Thirumulanadhar Temple, Sholavandan, and Sivan Temple, Melur, 9.30 a.m.

Gandhi Memorial Museum: K.P. Gangadharan, yoga coordinator conducts, yoga classes, 6 a.m., 10.30 a.m. and 5 p.m.

Rama Samajam: Upanyasam on ‘Sri Meenakshi Thirukalyanam’ by Visaka Hari Sringeri Sri Saradambal Sannidhi, bypass road, 6.30 p.m.

Arsha Parampara: Mundakopanishad 7 a.m. and Bhaja Govindam, Yagasalai Andalpuram, 6.30 p.m., Lalitha Sahasranamam and spiritual heritage classes by Swamini Vidyananda Saraswathi, Old Kalyana Mandapam, Meenakshi Temple, 10 a.m.

Sri Aurobindo Study Forum: Sath sang on Sri Aurobindo’s ‘Life divine’ by Prof. Subramony, Nithyatha, Aurolab, Veerapanchan, 10 a.m.

Madurai Hindu Nadar Bakta Sabai: Discourse by Illampirai Manimaran on ‘Geethai Ennum Pokkisham,’ Mottai Vinayagar Mahal,’ East Masi Street, 6.30 p.m.

Sivananda Tapovanam: Swami Vimalananda’s 15{+t}{+h}mahasamadhi aradhana special function, Swami Sivananda Sundarananda presides, Thirumurai Isai by Meenakshi Temple Oduvars, Thoppur Sivananda Nagar, 6 p.m.

International Sivananda Yoga Vedanta Centre: Yoga and meditation classes, 444 KK Nagar East Ninth Street, 6 a.m., 6.30 p.m., 10 a.m. and 4 p.m. (for women).

Prajapita Brahma Kumaris Ishwariya Vishwa Vidyalaya: Free rajayoga meditation classes, 36 Meenakshi Nagar, P and T Nagar, 40 Sambandamoorthy Street, 47 B CMR Road and 357 Anna Nagar, 6.30 a.m. and 5.30 p.m.

Yoga Research Centre: Yoga training by S. Yoganand, Department of Philosophy, Madura College, 6.30 a.m.

GENERAL

Sri Sathguru Sangeetha Samajam: Conferment of the titles – 2016 Madhurakala praveena on Sangeetha vidwan Sanjay Subrahmanyan, Madhurakala Mani on Mrudanga vidwan Palladam R. Ravi, presentation of cash award to violin vidwan M. Dhakshinamoorthy by Shobana Ramachandran, president, samajam, Lakshmi Sundaram Hall, 5.15 p.m.

Madurai Media and Film Studies Academy: Interaction with cine director Chimbu Devan and distribution of certificates for the first batch of students, Academy Director Dr. T. Chinnaraj Joseph Jaikumar, presides, Old Natham Road, 5 p.m.

Gomathipuram Thendral Nagar Residents’ Association: Inauguration of CCTV cameras, Commissioner of Police Shailesh Kumar Yadav chief guest, Rajaprabha Kalyana Mandapam, fifth main road, 10.30 a.m.

Madurai Vetrilai Paaku Beedi Cigarette Varthagar Sangam: 73{+r}{+d}anniversary, Minister ‘Sellur’ K. Raju, Mayor V.V. Rajan Chellappa, Madurai MP R. Gopalakrishnan address, Sangam president P.A. Sankar presides, Chandrakulandai Thirumana Mahal, Kamarajar Salai, Teppakulam, 10 a.m.

Neyam Special School: Graduation day and grand opening of mainstream classroom, hi-tech sensory, developmental and speech therapy rooms, V.C. Gandhi and B. Deivanayakam guests of honour, R. Azhagarswamy presides, Sasi Nagar West, Edison Street, P and T Nagar, 11 a.m.

Giants Group of Madurai Thirunagar: New office-bearers installation, P.S. Kannan Kings College of Engineering, Thanjavur chief guest, CA.M. Lakshmanan, Deputy World Chairman, Giants International, guest of honour, V. Ayyappan speaks, No. 26-A Rajaji Street, Tirunagar, 6.30 p.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meeting, V.R. Krishna Iyer Community Hall, 7 p.m., Alfred Noble Mat. HSS Tirunagar, 11 a.m.

MELUR

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meeting, R.C. School, Sivaganga Road, 6.30 p.m.
title: madurai today
